name: Tina Williams
callout: Kevin and his team were able to deliver on time and professional results.
full: I used Kevin and Brewww to design my logo for my craft business. Kevin was able to take my ideas and raw sketches and turn them into a design that I am so excited to have represent my brand as I move forward. Kevin was able to walk me through the process and use real time feedback to change my design until I was satisfied with the look. This was my first time going through this process and Kevin and his team were able to deliver on time and professional results.
